122.content:
After the about the first hour into Nick being grounded, he started to get really bored. And as one of the side effects of boredom: Nick started to get hungry. So he went downstairs into his kitchen and made himself a sandwich. It was a very light meal consisting only of bread, mayonnaise, and a single slice of Bologna. He took it back up to his, room sat down on the edge of his bed, and turned on his TV that his parents let him keep. Nick slowly eat the sandwich bite by bite until it was all gone. His hunger was satisfied for now.

That is until another hour passed and Nick got hungry again. So he went downstairs and repeated his food order, went back upstairs and ate while watching TV. The soon after the third time he got hungry, he thought he would instead make two sandwiches this time. Maybe that will finally make him full and stop being hungry for the rest of the night. So he made his two sandwiches, sat down on his bed again.

And for the third time that night, he ate. And this finally made him full. He soon realized that in order to not feel hungry all the time, he would just need to eat a little more than he usually does. But as we all know, a little soon turns into a lot.

1221.content:
It was Saturday morning. Nick spent the morning playing Xbox, bored and depressed that he was stuck inside for the entire weekend. He felt his stomach growl with hunger. He ran down to the kitchen to grab a bite to eat. He looked in the pantry and grabbed a poptart. He quickly gobbled down the poptart and washed it down with milk. That was not quite enough to fill his stomach. Nick figured that if he was allowed out of his room to eat, he could spend some time there cooking and preparing a meal. He fill a bowl of cereal, scrambled some eggs, fried some bacon,and had some toast and butter. His older brother came into the kitchen as Nick was eating on the kitchen island.

"Hey little bro, shouldn't you be in your room? Aren't you grounded?" his brother, Mike asked.

"I'm allowed to eat, Mike," Nick replied, "Mom and dad aren't going to starve me out."

"Well you certainly don't look like you're starving," Mike commented and went to open the fridge.

"I'm just so bored," Nick replied, "Videogames, TV, and food are all I have, man."

"Careful, dude. Don't turn into a fatass," Mike said poking Nick's slim stomach.

Nick shrugged it off and took the rest of his food and a bag of potato chips to his room. Nick sat in his room watching TV and finished off his breakfast. A half hour passed and he realized that he mindlessly consumed the entire bag of chips as well as several sodas. He rubbed his swollen stomach and wiped off the crumbs that covered his shirt. He finally felt like he was full for now.

info.description:
Follow Nick as he gets grounded and finds it rather boring, and uses food and sleep to keep himself occupied.

Rules:

1. Nick may lose weight but the story must end in weight gain
2. Female WG and other male WG is allowed but Nick must gain weight
3. Nick can sneak out or secretly have friends over in the story even though he's grounded
4. Weight gain MUST be gradual... no more than 2 pounds per day
5. Gay is ok
6. Please write well and use dialog-poorly written chapters will be deleted
7. Have fun reading! All contributions are greatly appreciated :)
